𒌋𒌋𒌆𒇻 main herdsman 𒌋𒌋 𓏠

𓏠 main remain 𓏠 𓈖 𓏛 permanent permanência permanent

𒈪𒉡𒌋 me-nu-u remain, keep

𓏠 𓈖 𓏛||remain|'main gemein?
𓏠 𓈖 𓏛||be firm, established, enduring (of king)|ment,mend:fix

𒌣 umun₂ main body, bulk, life-giving force 𓋹 𓈖 𓐍 ⲱⲛϧ umunḫ

ϫⲓⲛⲁⲙⲟⲛⲓ m. arrest, restrain

𐌱𐌹𐌻𐌴𐌹𐌱𐌰𐌽 bιleιben leιbe bleiben, leave remain
